participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, family-oriented, and appreciates the simple joys in life.
participant_1.background: I am not comfortable sharing my weight. I am close with my family and always have been. My drum set is my most valued material possession because it is a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there. my parents pay my rent. i like to make fresh pies.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Easy-going, animal lover, and nostalgic about childhood adventures.
participant_2.background: I have a dog and a cat, and they are my best friends. I take my iguana outside to bask in the sun. I have two weaknesses: my eyes and my driving skills. I miss being able to run around in the woods behind my house without a care in the world. My family is not involved in my career.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! I just got home from a walk with my dog and cat. How are you?
That sounds nice! I'm doing well too. I'm just hanging out at home, making a pie.
Oh, that sounds delicious! I love pie. What kind are you making?
I'm making a peach pie. I love peaches!
I love peaches too! I used to have a peach tree in my backyard. It was so much fun to pick fresh peaches and eat them right off the tree.
That sounds amazing! I wish I had a peach tree.
Me too! But I don't have a yard anymore. I live in an apartment now.
Oh, that's too bad. But at least you have your dog and cat to keep you company!
Yes, I'm so glad I have them. They're the best.
Me too! I love my dog. She's my best friend.
Dogs are the best. They're always so happy to see you.
Yes, they are! I'm so glad I met you today.
Me too! I hope we can talk again soon.
Me too! Have a good night!
